tasks.title: Org-wide workflow deployment & indexing — BlackRoad-OS-Inc
tasks.description: Deploy production-scale GitHub Actions workflows to ALL repos in the BlackRoad-OS-Inc organization. Reusable template is at .github/workflows/reusable-blackroad-org-deploy.yml in this repo. Each target repo must call this workflow and pass the required secrets (BR_DEPLOY_SECRET, STRIPE_SECRET_KEY, CLERK_SECRET_KEY). Indexing of all repos must happen NOW so Copilot and search surfaces are current.

checklist.item: Add reusable-blackroad-org-deploy.yml caller to every BlackRoad-OS-Inc repo
Set STRIPE_SECRET_KEY + STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET secrets in every repo
Set CLERK_SECRET_KEY + CLERK_ISSUER_URL secrets in every repo
Set BR_DEPLOY_URL + BR_DEPLOY_SECRET for API-triggered deploys
Trigger org-wide re-index (GitHub code search / Copilot indexing)
Verify E2E Stripe checkout → Clerk auth flow on blackroad.io
